definition[0]: stock where ownership is recorded on a list, and which is not always shown on SHARE CERTIFICATEs
example[0]: If your stock is held in bearer form, you might find that settlement is quicker if you switch the holding into registered stock.
definition[1]: used to talk about the stockmarket where a particular stock is traded
example[1]: The bank’s London-registered stock was up 17.5 to £14.76.
